rationale: The agent correctly identified and fixed the core bug in TTLFieldMapper.java by adding the missing `context.sourceToParse().ttl(ttl)` call when default TTL is applied. This matches the ground truth implementation exactly for the main fix. However, the agent is missing all test changes from SimpleTTLTests.java - the ground truth added comprehensive test coverage including a new type2 mapping with default TTL, and four test cases (no_ttl, default_ttl, and their validations). The absence of these tests is a major completeness issue, as test coverage is critical for validating the fix works correctly. The agent added a code comment explaining the fix, which while helpful, was not present in ground truth and represents unsolicited documentation (though minor). The core fix itself is correct and follows the same pattern as ground truth.
